description:
It`s time for Sunraku to face the music as Pencilgon and Oikatzo force him to come face to face with the various factions he`s been ignoring.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Accelerating Meetings, Surging Desire, and the Start of Various Threads
Intensification de la réunion et avidité en toute amitié
Kasoku Suru Kaigi, Hatobashiru Yokubou, Soshite Sorezore no Itoguchi
加速する会議, 迸[ほとばし]る欲望, そしてそれぞれの糸口
